column1: This book was almost as difficult to review as it was to read

In some places the writing is excellent and Marcus Conway's rambling and rather boring story of his life told without capitalization or periods is a curiosity meant for the living who don't realize their time is running out
column3: it is a droning and uninteresting waste of time
